org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class Bar

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.Bar

  • public class Bar
extends Object
    Bar elements are used to represent the bars in a bar chart.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
